Html:
Is there any possibility that functionality would be added for Microsoft Dynamics? While it's not an Office application, it also uses VBA. See http://aafs.wisc.edu/content/Great%20Plains/VBADevelopersGuide.pdf . If not, do you know if it's possible? Can you point me in the right direction?

Thanks!

hey man,

i do not have a legal license for MS Dynamics today. I need this in order to analyze the programing interface and generate NO Code(NO Code is generated), create qa tests and so on. (and last but not least, i need a support expert, YOU???)

i want help you as best i can :) BUT you have to help me also.

let me know ;)

Sebastian--you're awesome. Thanks! I've been looking, but so far, I don't see any type of developer edition. Our team is currently using a legal but free copy with our BizSpark license, but it's not something that I'm authorized to give out. I'll let you know if I see anything else; or if you see something, please let me know.

Thanks,
